subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A foul-plagued Vince Carter scored 13 of his 19 points in the third quarter, and the Nets had one of their best defensive games of the season in a victory against Philadelphia on Saturday night.
snippet: A foul-plagued Vince Carter scored 13 of his 19 points in the third quarter, and the Nets had one of their best defensive games of the season in a victory against Philadelphia on Saturday night.
